name: PostVoidResidual
title: Post Void Residual
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing an observation of post void residual urine.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an the amount of urine left in the bladder after a void.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Post Void Residual.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Post Void Residual.)
